items.title: Introduction to Arduino with Elegoo UNO Super Starter Kit
items.headline: Embedded systems using Arduino Elegoo UNO Super Starter Kit
objectives_summary: After the course you will know how to edit a sketch (program) in the Arduino IDE, connect the hardware and transfer the program to you Arduino. Execute it and start enjoying.
A lot of sensors come with the kit, so you will master sensors for temperature, humidity, besides you will have things in movement with the motors.
In short, a great introduction to later courses on advanced electronics.

Be productive with the Arduino IDE, write, compile and upload sketches, install libraries
How to setup the Arduino software and start outputting code
